personal.name: Maulik Joshi
personal.title: Backend-Focused Full-Stack Developer
personal.headline: Building Scalable Systems & Seamless Web Experiences
personal.subtext: I'm Maulik Joshi â€” a backend-focused full-stack developer who enjoys building modern web applications with clean, reliable code.
personal.about: I'm a dedicated 2nd-year BSc Hons Computing student at London Metropolitan University, studying at Islington College Kathmandu. My coding journey started in 2023 with HTML, CSS, and the first half of Python, then in 2024 completed the other half of Python along with JavaScript and Databases, then expanded into Java, Cloud Computing, CI/CD, Django, and React in 2025. I'm a curious learner who enjoys building practical backend systems while creating clean frontend experiences.

education.institution: London Metropolitan University (via Islington College, Kathmandu)
education.description: Currently in my 2nd year of BSc Hons Computing program, focusing on software development, computer science fundamentals, and practical application of modern technologies.

experience.title: Student Developer & Freelancer
experience.description: Working on various web development projects including e-commerce sites, desktop applications, and web tools. Gaining experience in full-stack development through hands-on projects and academic coursework.

experience.title: Tech Enthusiast & Self-Learner
experience.description: Developed multiple projects including Django web applications, React frontends, Java desktop applications, and database management systems. Continuously learning through self-directed projects and university coursework.

projects.title: Imperial Watch Store
projects.description: One of my first college group projects where I served as project lead. A luxury e-commerce website for high-end watches built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features responsive design, shopping cart functionality, advanced filtering, and smooth animations. Showcased modern web development practices and e-commerce functionality.

projects.title: Gym Management System
projects.description: My Java project from early 2025 that I enhanced even more. A comprehensive desktop application built with Java Swing for managing gym memberships, attendance tracking, payment processing, and plan upgrades. Features modern UI with dark theme, dashboard analytics, and data persistence.

projects.title: CV Craft Pro
projects.description: An AI-powered resume builder that helps users create professional resumes with intelligent suggestions and modern templates. Built with React frontend, Django backend, and PostgreSQL database hosted on Render.

projects.title: TaskFlow Manager
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.

certificates.title: Meta Backend Developer Certificate
certificates.description: Comprehensive backend development course covering APIs, databases, and server-side technologies

certificates.title: Python for Everybody
certificates.description: Complete Python programming course covering fundamentals to advanced concepts
